text: @SenSchumer Why Mr Schumer does NY have a third of nations Coronavirus deaths? Why are you not outraged at your governor for letting it get this far and allowing Covid patients into unprepared nursing homes? While common sense reigns In Georgia your liberal sense makes no sense.
